text: 2|58|Mēlum, (uṅkaḷ mūtātaiyarkaḷai nōkki) “nīṅkaḷ inta nakarukku ceṉṟu atil uṅkaḷukku viruppamāṉa iṭattil (viruppamāṉavaṟṟait) tārāḷamākap puciyuṅkaḷ; ataṉ vāyilil (nuḻaiyumpoḻutu) talai kuṉintu celluṅkaḷ; ‘hittatuṉ' (eṅkaḷ pāvaccumai nīṅkuka!) Eṉavum kūṟuṅkaḷ. Uṅkaḷ kuṟṟaṅkaḷai nām maṉṉittu viṭuvōm. Naṉmai ceytavarkaḷukku (ataṉ kūliyai) atikappaṭuttiyum koṭuppōm'' eṉak kūṟiyiruntōm
